article.title: Neutrino spin oscillations in curved space-time under the influence of external fields

choices: The probability of neutrino spin oscillations as a function of the radius.
The relationship between the Schwarzschild radius and the frequency of neutrino oscillations.
The frequency of neutrino spin oscillations as a function of the radius of the neutrino orbit.
The impact of the black hole mass on the neutrino spin oscillation frequency.
